scripts.brand:zip: bash -lc 'stamp=20251001-141749; zip -j public/ClickApp_BrandAssets_20251001-113701.zip public/clickapp_icon_ink.svg public/clickapp_icon_white.svg public/clickapp_wordmark_ink.svg public/clickapp_wordmark_white.svg public/clickapp_lockup_horiz_ink.svg public/clickapp_lockup_horiz_white.svg public/clickapp_lockup_stacked_ink.svg public/clickapp_lockup_stacked_white.svg public/icon-192.png public/icon-512.png public/favicon-16.png public/favicon-32.png public/favicon.ico public/og-image.png public/og-image-dark.png && echo ClickApp_BrandAssets_20251001-113701.zip'
scripts.brand:update-link: /usr/bin/perl -0777 -i -pe 'BEGIN{ $ENV{zip}=qx/ls -t public\/ClickApp_BrandAssets_*.zip 2>\/dev\/null | head -n1 | xargs -n1 basename/; chomp $ENV{zip}; } s#]*>\s*Download All Assets\s*<\/a>#sprintf("Download All Assets", $ENV{zip})#se' public/brand.html
scripts.brand:all: npm run images && npm run favicons && npm run brand:zip && npm run brand:update-link
